Title: The Sex
Writer: Marta Kauffman (created by), Howard J. Morris (created by), David Budin, Brendan McCarthy
Actors: Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Sam Waterston, Martin Sheen
Plot: Frankie takes a new look at her Yam Man Jacob, while Grace and Guy get closer. Bud and Coyote have a brotherly talk. Sol is terrified of Brianna.
